title: Kannan Karthikeyan
text:
Summary
As an undergraduate in Fintech and Applied Computing at Singapore Institute of Technology, I am passionate about leveraging technology to create meaningful financial solutions.
I am driven by a strong interest in software development, digital transformation, and the evolving Fintech landscape.
Additionally, I have sharpened my critical thinking and design innovation skills through interdisciplinary modules focused on communication and creativity.
I am also currently exploring the capabilities of prompt engineering in digital transformation projects specifically using AI to automate tasks and streamline workflows that improvises employee productivity at UOB

title: Reflection on the use of GenAI
text: Quick Links:

title: Reflection on the use of GenAI
section: What is the GenAI tool you have used? Why did you choose it?
text:
What is the GenAI tool you have used? Why did you choose it?
I used ChatGPT to help structure my sentences and organise written content. Based on my experience, ChatGPT is effective at improving clarity, coherence, and overall flow of explanations, which was particularly useful when describing technical and financial concepts.
In addition, I used Claude to clean up and refine my Quarto code. Claude was chosen because it is more proficient at understanding and formatting code, especially for markup-based documents, helping to improve code readability and correctness.

title: Reflection on the use of GenAI
section: How did the GenAI tool help you in completing the assessment (with examples)?
text:
How did the GenAI tool help you in completing the assessment (with examples)?
Claude helped correct and refine Quarto code, particularly when formatting images and structuring page content with hyperlinks. This made it easier to present the website clearly and consistently.

title: Reflection on the use of GenAI
section: What do you think are beneficial about the tool?
text:
What do you think are beneficial about the tool?
ChatGPT was useful for improving sentence structure and organising written explanations, while Claude was effective in correcting and refining code within the Quarto document. Together, they improved both content quality and technical accuracy.

title: Reflection on the use of GenAI
section: What do you think are challenging about the tool?
text:
What do you think are challenging about the tool?
One challenge was that the tools sometimes generated more content than necessary, requiring manual filtering to keep the work concise and relevant.

title: Reflection on the use of GenAI
section: How do you think will GenAI tools assist you for your future study or work?
text:
How do you think will GenAI tools assist you for your future study or work?
GenAI tools can improve productivity by automating tasks such as grammar checking, content structuring, and debugging code, allowing more time to focus on analysis and problem-solving.

title: Data Visualization Project
text:
About the Data
This dataset is used to evaluate investment decisions for a company as part of a Finance module. The data presents projected financial performance over a five-year period under three different scenarios: Best Case, Base Case, and Worst Case.
The projections are designed to help assess the financial viability and risk profile of a proposed project by comparing expected outcomes under varying assumptions. This type of scenario analysis is commonly used in capital budgeting and strategic financial planning.

title: Data Visualization Project
text:
What the Data Represents
The visualisations illustrate the expected investment returns over five years for a company project under different operational conditions
Each scenario includes the following financial metrics:

Revenue:
Represents the total projected income generated by the project each year.


Scenario Overview

Best Case:
Assumes strong revenue growth, efficient cost management, and favourable market conditions, resulting in high cumulative cash flows and strong investment returns.
Base Case:
Represents the most realistic and expected outcome based on moderate growth and stable operating conditions.
Worst Case:
Reflects adverse conditions such as slower growth or higher costs, leading to lower profitability and increased investment risk.

Together, these scenarios provide a comprehensive view of potential upside and downside risks, supporting informed investment decision-making.
